name: YWDA
description:
WARNING: requires rapid and sequential key pressing. I hope I didn't make it too tough.

An attempt to adapt the art installation I saw during the NEMOSKVA exhibition in St. Petersburg. The installation is "You Will Die Anyway" by Aleksey Ilkayev.

Model and animations from Mixamo.

Step sound from:

https://freesound.org/people/edwin_p_manchester/sounds/1858/
